author: scnut
title: My first castle set
review: I remember saving up around $40 when I was a kid to buy this set, and I finally did. Somewhere in my parents old photo albums there's a picture of me at about 5 or 6 years old right after I put it together. I played with this set for years and years, so many times that I could put it together without instructions and my eyes closed. I still have it too, mixed in with 30,000+ other Legos. And I think I still have most of the instructions too. Great set!
